about.details:
Incorporated in 2007, Prime Customer Services Ltd is a multi-services customer focused organization and provides value added services. The company offers end-to-end warehousing solutions including maintaining records, unloading, storage, loading, etc, re-packing and packaging services and skilled, semi-skilled, and unskilled laborers on contract basis as well as operates cold storage and ripening chambers for fruits, vegetables, flowers, and frozen food items.

They are also engages in the trading of perishable food items, primarily fruits and vegetables in the domestic as well as export markets. PCSL’s customers are primarily located in the western India, majorly Gujarat and Maharashtra. The company exports its products to the United Arab Emirates.

contactDetails.full_address: Prime Customer Services Ltd, 41/6 8/A Haji Pir Kirvani Dargah, Jamalpur Char Rasta, Nr. Marwari Chal Ahmedabad

faqs.question: What is the Prime Customer Services IPO?
faqs.answer:
Prime Customer Services IPO is a SME IPO of 1214000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹7.28 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹60 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on March 20, 2017, and closes on March 23, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Prime Customer Services IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Prime Customer Services IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Prime Customer Services IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Prime Customer Services IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Prime Customer Services IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Prime Customer Services IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Prime Customer Services IPO opens on March 20, 2017 and closes on March 23, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Prime Customer Services IPO?
faqs.answer: Prime Customer Services IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Prime Customer Services IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Prime Customer Services IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
